titles: Mainz Edge Frankfurt in Thrilling Bundesliga Match

captions.text: Mainz take the win! FSV Mainz 05 edge out Eintracht Frankfurt 2-1 in a thrilling Bundesliga match. Yoshinori Muto and Yunus Mallı score crucial goals for the home team.
GOAL! Haris Seferović scores late goal for Eintracht Frankfurt, but it's not enough to take down Mainz 2-1

summary: FSV Mainz 05 edged out Eintracht Frankfurt 2-1 in a thrilling Bundesliga match. Yoshinori Muto and Yunus Mallı scored crucial goals for the home team, while Haris Seferović's late goal was not enough to turn the tide.

key_moments.description: Muto opens the scoring for Mainz
Seferović scores late goal for Eintracht
